


1/ open ssh connection between personal to gcp
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/59533620/how-to-connect-to-gcp-vm-instance-with-password-using-ssh

2/ build user and given super
https://phoenixnap.com/kb/how-to-create-sudo-user-on-ubuntu

3/ update apt-get
sudo apt-get update

4/ install python3.6
sudo apt-get install python3

5/ install pip3
sudo apt-get install python3-pip 

6/ install numpy as test
pip3 install numpy
python3
import numpy

7/ install jupyterlab
pip3 install jupyterlab

8/ install vs-code
...
